H0.text: Which once popular social network announced it was to close down. MySpace

H1.text: Which once popular social network announced it was to close down. Orkut

H2.text: Which once popular social network announced it was to close down. Google+

H3.text: Which once popular social network announced it was to close down. Friendsreunited

A4.text: On June 30, 2014, Google announced that Orkut would be shutting down completely on September 30, 2014.

A5.text: No new accounts could be created starting from July 2014.
